objects.text:
• 40 Hour Battery Life
• Active Noise Cancellation
• Hi-Res Audio Certified
• Comfortable Fit Design

product_details.name: Bose QuietComfort Bluetooth Headphones, Wireless Headphones with Active Over Ear Noise Cancelling and Mic, Deep Bass, Up to 24 Hours of Playtime, White Smoke
product_details.description:
- Go beyond the beat and take control of the sound that puts you on top of the world with Bose QuietComfort Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones.
- Experience powerful high-fidelity audio with legendary noise cancellation in these wireless Bluetooth headphones that allow you to block everything out but the beat and control what you hear.
- These Bose wireless headphones feature new custom modes that give you the power to adjust noise cancellation based in the moment and the option to turn on Wind Block to tune out breezy environments.
- Or simply toggle your Bose over ear headphones between Quiet and Aware Modes for a quick change when the world calls for it.
- Adjustable EQ puts you in control of tuning your music and Spotify Tap starts your listening session at the push of a button on the side of the over the ear headphones.
- With up to 24 hours of battery life on a single charge, your Bluetooth headphones are ready for any adventure.
- Multi-point toggle lets you switch between multiple wireless connections on these around ear headphones without disconnecting and reconnecting each time.
- Plug in the optional audio cable with in-line microphone into these wireless headphones to make the headphones wired and use without a Bluetooth connection.
- The Bose Music app guides you through setup, lets you personalize settings, and keeps your headphones software up-to-date.
- Press play and take charge of your music with Bose QuietComfort Noise Cancelling Headphones.

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a bold and modern headphone product advertisement with a tech-oriented aesthetic. The design is centered around a high-quality product image ("product_image") placed prominently over layered purple and violet gradient shapes that add depth and dimension to the background. Large, bold headline text ("heading") at the top uses a clean sans-serif font in white, complemented by a sleek, futuristic subheading ("tagline") in hot pink. A list of four core features ("description") is displayed in a clean, white font to the left of the product. The pricing detail ("price") is emphasized in vibrant pink to draw attention, and a rectangular button ("cta_button") with rounded corners and matching color houses the white call-to-action text ("cta"), encouraging immediate shopping interaction. The overall layout reflects clarity and balance with a strong focus on visual hierarchy.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: `#1E1E2F`
- Soft Violet: `#6545E8`
- Deep Purple: `#5038BC`
- Hot Pink: `#FF4D94`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of sleek, modern headphones in a refined matte beige color palette. The dominant hue is a soft taupe-beige (#CBC1B8), giving it a calm and premium appeal. Accents and shadowing are rendered in a slightly darker mocha beige (#AFA59F), while edges and highlight areas are enhanced with a pale sand tone (#E3DBD1), maintaining cohesion. The Bose logo appears in a subtle silvery grey (#A5A5A5), integrating seamlessly yet distinguishably. These shades blend harmoniously, creating depth through soft gradients and lighting. This minimalist palette lends itself beautifully to elegant advertisement banners with a clean, sophisticated aesthetic.
